text: The Destination is the debut mini album by Thai singer-songwriter and the 1st runner-up of True Visions' Academy Fantasia season 4, Vontongchai Intarawat, as a solo artist. The official release date of this album is May 8, 2008. The album contains a special CD+VCD package (5 tracks and 5 karaoke videos). ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="center"|# !align="center" width="150"|Title !align="center" width="200"|Lyricist(s) !align="center" width="200"|Composer(s) !align="center" width="200"|Arranger(s) !align="center"|Length |- |1. |"เรายังรักกัน...ไม่ใช่เหรอ" |Chantima 9 |Jirasak Panpoom |Jiranat Phisittawichai |3:50 |- |2. |"นางฟ้าตาชั้นเดียว" |Chantima 9 |Pongsapak Tongcharoen |CPJ Team |3:06 |- |3. |"ขอโทษ" |Vontongchai Intarawat |Intarawat |Santhan Laohawattanawit |4:37 |- |4. |"แค่อยากให้รู้" |Sirapatara Kalayapanid |Raucleaner + Markarm |Raucleaner + Markarm |3:34 |- |5. |"เลือกลืม เลือกจำ" |Thongchai Thongoen |Sayumphoo Nilawan |Nilawan |3:50 |} == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |- !
